description: Completed comprehensive audit of fast_search tool (1/15 tools). Tool rated EXCELLENT with 95% confidence - production-ready with only minor documentation improvements needed. Key findings: (1) Don't frame semantic as "slow option" - HNSW is <100ms and MCP overhead makes difference negligible, (2) Add .memories/ example to file_pattern parameter to increase memory search visibility, (3) Add explicit examples for when to use semantic mode (conceptual queries, memory searches) vs hybrid mode. Tool strengths: automatic semantic fallback when text returns 0 results, optimal parameter defaults (limit=10, text default with fallback, context_lines=1), excellent behavioral adoption language, token-efficient output with confidence scoring. Architecture is clean with no redundancy. v1.6.1 optimizations (removed code_context, memory-specific pipeline, 2.0x boost) working perfectly. Ready to audit next tool (get_symbols).
